title: Unexpected Kernel Error
body: Whenever I launch League of Legends, my pc goes into a blue screen displaying "your pc ran into a problem and needs to restart. We are just collecting some error info, and then we'll restart for you." It's also giving me a stop code: UNEXPECTED KERNEL MODE TRAP. Does anyone have a solution to this issue? I would really be appreciated for the help.

replies.body:
Wow, it sounds like your PC may have driver or hardware issues. I recommend checking out our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) since it covers a lot of solutions for this type of issue.

Let me know if this issue persists through those steps.
